comment.author: 31553111@N05
comment._content:
I have the young man in this photo standing right next to me now!  He's still as handsome now, at the ripe old age of 74, as he was then!

Here he is now:

I'm here looking at the screen, with my son and his fiancee, my wife and daughter, celebrating my son's 45th birthday!

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content:
Good Afternoon
Thank you for your comments - it's great to hear stories like this one! Very interesting indeed!
Can you remember why this photo was taken? was it a special occasion?
We look forward to hearing from you
Thank you once again!

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
